trans-unit.source: Represents an image annotation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the alignment of the annotation image.
This property is used to align a non-scaled image.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the annotation image.
Gets the annotation type name.

This abstract property is used to get the name of each annotation type such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation>, and so forth.
This property is for internal use.
The annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
Gets or sets the name of the annotation image.
The image name can be a file name, a URL or a named image—that is, its name component—from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection> class.
A `string` value that represents the name of the annotation image.
Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the image is drawn.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be replaced with a transparent color when he image is drawn.
Gets or sets the drawing mode of the image.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value that defines the drawing mode of the image.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
This property is not applicable to the image annotation type.
An `integer` value.
Gets or sets the text style of the annotation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation.TextStyle"></xref> enumeration value that represents the style used to draw the annotation text.
